This specification defines APIs to execute navigation application on Automotive device.

Summary of Methods

InterfaceMethod
NavigationObject
Navigation void executeRouteSearch(double latitude, double longitude)
void executeShowMap(double latitude, double longitude)
void executePoiSearch(DOMString name)
void registerMyLocation(double latitude, double longitude, DOMString name)

Introduction

This API provides a way to execute the navigation application.

Interfaces

NavigationObject

Defines what is instantiated in the motor.application object.
There will be a motor.application.navigation object that allows accessing the functionality of the navigation module.
readonly attribute Navigation navigation

Navigation

Navigation interface.
void executeRouteSearch(double latitude, double longitude)
Executes the navigation application as the route search mode.
Signature
void executeRouteSearch(double latitude, double longitude)
Exceptions
MotorAPIError:
with error code TYPE_MISMATCH_ERR if any input parameter is not compatible with the expected type for that parameter.
with error code INVALID_VALUES_ERR if the input parameter contains an invalid value.
with error code NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR if this function is not supported.
							motor.application.navigation.executeRouteSearch(37.497978, 127.027703);
void executeShowMap(double latitude, double longitude)
Executes the navigation application and shows the given location on the map.
Signature
void executeShowMap(double latitude, double longitude)
Exceptions
MotorAPIError:
with error code TYPE_MISMATCH_ERR if any input parameter is not compatible with the expected type for that parameter.
with error code INVALID_VALUES_ERR if the input parameter contains an invalid value.
with error code NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR if this function is not supported.
							motor.application.navigation.executeShowMap(37.497978, 127.027703);
void executePoiSearch(DOMString name)
Executes the navigation application and searches the given location name.
Signature
void executePoiSearch(DOMString name)
Exceptions
MotorAPIError:
with error code TYPE_MISMATCH_ERR if any input parameter is not compatible with the expected type for that parameter.
with error code INVALID_VALUES_ERR if the input parameter contains an invalid value.
with error code NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR if this function is not supported.
							motor.application.navigation.executePoiSearch("Kangnam Station");
void registerMyLocation(double latitude, double longitude, DOMString name)
Executes the navigation application and registers for the given place name and the given location.
Signature
void registerMyLocation(double latitude, double longitude, DOMString name)
Exceptions
MotorAPIError:
with error code TYPE_MISMATCH_ERR if any input parameter is not compatible with the expected type for that parameter.
with error code INVALID_VALUES_ERR if the input parameter contains an invalid value.
with error code NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR if this function is not supported.
							motor.application.navigation.registerMyLocation(37.497978, 127.027703, "Kangnam Station");

Features

When the feature
  • http://obigo.com/api/application.navigation
or any of the features hierarchically under that feature is successfully requested, the interface Navigation is instantiated, and the resulting object appears in the global namespace as motor.application.navigation.
This is the list of URIs used to declare this API's features, for use in the widget config.xml. For each URL, the list of functions covered is provided.

http://obigo.com/api/application.navigation
Access to all the features in this module.
